meanings.definition: The external part of the ear.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful earring that dangled from her auris.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her auris carefully to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chewed on the auris of the stuffed bear.
meanings.sent4: His auris perked up when he heard the sound of his favorite song playing.
meanings.sent5: The auris of the rabbit twitched as it listened for any signs of danger.

meanings.sent1: His auris picked up on the faint sound of distant thunder.
meanings.sent2: She lost her auris temporarily after attending a loud concert.
meanings.sent3: The auris of the detective caught every whisper in the room.
meanings.sent4: The auris of the old radio seemed to come alive with each new station.
meanings.sent5: The auris of the owl allowed it to hunt silently in the night.
